content: **knitted hat in drops nepal the piece is worked with textured pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ne-350 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **materials** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-150-150 g colour 7120 light grey blue needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm for pattern/stocking stitch drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm for rib drops double pointed needles size 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
